fileSamples.statement:
forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),
loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->
ofs1 <= ofs2 -> loc_argument_32_charact ofs1 l.
fileSamples.conclusion:
forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),
loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->
ofs1 <= ofs2 -> loc_argument_32_charact ofs1 l
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct l; simpl; intros; auto.
destruct sl; auto.
intuition lia.

fileSamples.statement:
(ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (sl : slot) (pos : Z) (ty : typ) (H : match sl with
| Outgoing => pos >= ofs2 /\ typealign ty = 1
| _ => False
end) (H0 : ofs1 <= ofs2) : match sl with
| Outgoing => pos >= ofs1 /\ typealign ty = 1
| _ => False
end.
fileSamples.conclusion:
match sl with
| Outgoing => pos >= ofs1 /\ typealign ty = 1
| _ => False
end
fileSamples.hypotheses:
(ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (sl : slot) (pos : Z) (ty : typ) (H : match sl with
| Outgoing => pos >= ofs2 /\ typealign ty = 1
| _ => False
end) (H0 : ofs1 <= ofs2)

fileSamples.statement: (ofs1 ofs2 pos : Z) (ty : typ) (H : pos >= ofs2 /\ typealign ty = 1) (H0 : ofs1 <= ofs2) : pos >= ofs1 /\ typealign ty = 1.
fileSamples.hypotheses: (ofs1 ofs2 pos : Z) (ty : typ) (H : pos >= ofs2 /\ typealign ty = 1) (H0 : ofs1 <= ofs2)

fileSamples.statement:
(X : forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),
loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->
ofs1 <= ofs2 -> loc_argument_32_charact ofs1 l) : forall (tyl : list typ) (ofs : Z) (p : rpair loc),
In p (loc_arguments_32 tyl ofs) ->
forall_rpair (loc_argument_32_charact ofs) p.
fileSamples.conclusion:
forall (tyl : list typ) (ofs : Z) (p : rpair loc),
In p (loc_arguments_32 tyl ofs) ->
forall_rpair (loc_argument_32_charact ofs) p
fileSamples.hypotheses:
(X : forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),
loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->
ofs1 <= ofs2 -> loc_argument_32_charact ofs1 l)
fileSamples.proofString:
induction tyl as [ | ty tyl]; simpl loc_arguments_32; intros.
contradiction.
destruct H.
destruct ty; subst p; simpl; lia.
apply IHtyl in H.
generalize (typesize_pos ty); intros.
destruct p; simpl in *.
eapply X; eauto; lia.
destruct H; split; eapply X; eauto; lia.

(X : forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),

fileSamples.statement:
(X : forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),
loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->
ofs1 <= ofs2 -> loc_argument_32_charact ofs1 l) (ty : typ) (tyl : list typ) (IHtyl : forall (ofs0 : Z) (p0 : rpair loc),
In p0 (loc_arguments_32 tyl ofs0) ->
forall_rpair (loc_argument_32_charact ofs0) p0) (ofs : Z) (p : rpair loc) (H : In p
  (match ty with
   | Tlong => Twolong (S Outgoing (ofs + 1) Tint) (S Outgoing ofs Tint)
   | _ => One (S Outgoing ofs ty)
   end :: loc_arguments_32 tyl (ofs + typesize ty))) : forall_rpair (loc_argument_32_charact ofs) p.
fileSamples.hypotheses:
(X : forall (ofs1 ofs2 : Z) (l : loc),
loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->
ofs1 <= ofs2 -> loc_argument_32_charact ofs1 l) (ty : typ) (tyl : list typ) (IHtyl : forall (ofs0 : Z) (p0 : rpair loc),
In p0 (loc_arguments_32 tyl ofs0) ->
forall_rpair (loc_argument_32_charact ofs0) p0) (ofs : Z) (p : rpair loc) (H : In p
  (match ty with
   | Tlong => Twolong (S Outgoing (ofs + 1) Tint) (S Outgoing ofs Tint)
   | _ => One (S Outgoing ofs ty)
   end :: loc_arguments_32 tyl (ofs + typesize ty)))
fileSamples.proofString:
destruct H.
destruct ty; subst p; simpl; lia.
apply IHtyl in H.
generalize (typesize_pos ty); intros.
destruct p; simpl in *.
eapply X; eauto; lia.
destruct H; split; eapply X; eauto; lia.

| Tlong => Twolong (S Outgoing (ofs + 1) Tint) (S Outgoing ofs Tint)

end = p) : forall_rpair (loc_argument_32_charact ofs) p.

loc_argument_32_charact ofs2 l ->

| Tlong => Twolong (S Outgoing (ofs + 1) Tint) (S Outgoing ofs Tint)
| _ => One (S Outgoing ofs ty)
end = p)
fileSamples.proofString: destruct ty; subst p; simpl; lia.
